item.title: 政治稳定与财政可持续性相辅相成
item.description: 您好，欢迎阅读本期通讯，这里汇集了Odd Lots世界每日精选内容。有时是我们——乔·韦森塔尔和特蕾西·阿洛威——为您解读市场、金融与经济领域的最新动态；有时则是来自专家嘉宾和信息源网络的深度贡献。无论内容形式如何，我们承诺始终为您带来精彩内容。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 与俄罗斯有关联的稳定币交易量一年内突破1000亿美元
item.description: 为规避对俄罗斯制裁而创建的卢布挂钩稳定币，自推出以来不到一年时间内交易额已突破1000亿美元——尽管该代币本身仍面临持续限制。【原文：The ruble-backed stablecoin created to circumvent sanctions on Russia has surpassed $100 billion in transactions in less than a year since its launch — even as the token itself faces ongoing restrictions.】

item.title: 男装仓库公司增发11亿美元债券以提升分红
item.description: 男士服装仓库的母公司Tailored Brands Inc.将贷款和债券发行规模合计增加2亿美元，用于向股东支付更高额的股息。【原文：Tailored Brands Inc., the parent company of Men’s Wearhouse, boosted its loan and bond offerings by a combined $200 million to fund an even larger dividend payout to its owners.】

item.title: 斯塔默严阵以待，力阻伯纳姆进入下议院
item.description: 基尔·斯塔默正准备与一位关键左翼对手展开可能的对决，这场较量将考验英国首相抵御日益加剧的职位威胁的能力。【原文：Keir Starmer is bracing for a potential showdown with a key left-wing rival in a test of the British prime minister’s power to stave off the gathering threats to his job.】

item.title: 英国播客创作者正移师美国，以在关键市场赢得听众
item.description: 英国最受欢迎的播客节目大多尚未在美国达到同等热度。【原文：Most of the top podcasts in the UK have yet to hit the same levels of popularity in the US】

item.title: 从TACO到Widowmaker：驱动市场的交易指南
item.description: 本周，金融市场因特朗普总统非正统的地缘政治策略以及日本的传统竞选活动而被推向高潮。【原文：Financial markets were kicked into high-gear this week by President Donald Trump’s unorthodox approach to geopolitics and old-school electioneering in Japan.】

item.title: 曾任高盛银行家、在1MDB欺诈案中认罪者寻求赦免
item.description: 曾参与史上最大金融欺诈案之一的投行高管蒂姆·莱斯纳，在向联邦监狱投案前正寻求总统特赦。【原文：Tim Leissner, the former Goldman Sachs Group Inc. banker who admitted his role in one of the largest financial frauds in history, is seeking a presidential pardon before he surrenders to a federal prison.】

item.title: 特朗普对格陵兰的威胁如何重振了TACO贸易
item.description: 为争夺丹麦半自治领地格陵兰岛的控制权，美国总统唐纳德·特朗普威胁对八个欧洲国家的进口商品加征新关税。这场风波导致股市暴跌，投资者纷纷涌向黄金等避险资产。【原文：In his bid to gain control over Greenland, a semi-autonomous territory of Denmark, US President Donald Trump threatened to impose fresh tariffs on imports from eight European countries. The drama sent stocks sliding as investors flocked to gold and other safe-haven assets.】

item.title: 松林机会基金为新创投二级基金筹集22亿美元
item.description: 松林机遇合伙公司为其首支基金成功募集22亿美元，在风险投资市场快速增长的细分领域完成了一轮大规模融资。【原文：Pinegrove Opportunity Partners has raised $2.2 billion for its debut fund, closing a large investment round in a fast-growing niche of the venture capital market.】

item.title: 苹果扩大硬件主管职责范围，最新迹象显示其有望接任CEO
item.description: 苹果公司已扩大硬件主管约翰·特纳斯的职责范围，使其涵盖设计工作，这进一步巩固了他作为首席执行官蒂姆·库克潜在继任者的领先地位。【原文：Apple Inc. has expanded the job of hardware chief John Ternus to include design work, solidifying his status as a leading contender to eventually succeed Chief Executive Officer Tim Cook.】

item.title: 纽约州削减康埃迪电力公司85%的调价申请，称其价格过高
item.description: 据周四发布的新闻稿称，纽约监管机构批准了联合爱迪生公司与其他各方达成的协议，该协议将在未来三年内限制该公用事业公司的收入，并对客户账单的涨幅设定上限。【原文：New York regulators adopted an agreement between Consolidated Edison Inc. and other parties that would limit the utility’s revenues — and cap increases to customer bills — for the next three years, according to a news release Thursday.】

item.title: 沙特聚焦"更明智"的支出，因油价下跌导致收入受限
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯官员在达沃斯世界经济论坛上强化了政府财政政策转向的表态，称这个王国在经历多年"全速前进"后，正致力于调整战略，如今比以往任何时候都更注重"更明智"的支出。【原文：Saudi Arabian officials sharpened their messaging on the government’s fiscal shift at the World Economic Forum in Davos, saying the kingdom is focused now more than ever before on “wiser” spending as it works to fine tune its strategy after years of going “full throttle.”】

item.title: 据称猛犸公司考虑在今年下半年启动首次公开募股
item.description: 知情人士透露，消费品公司Mammoth Brands（旗下拥有男士剃须刀品牌Harry's）正考虑在今年下半年尽快在美国启动首次公开募股（IPO）。【原文：Consumer goods company Mammoth Brands, the owner of men’s razor brand Harry’s, is considering holding its US initial public offering as soon as the second half of this year, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 拉斯维加斯赌场老板推出货币优惠吸引加拿大游客
item.description: 拉斯维加斯赌场经营者德里克·史蒂文斯将接受与美元等值的加元，以期挽回其旗下三家拉斯维加斯赌场的顾客。【原文：Las Vegas casino operator Derek Stevens will accept Canadian dollars on a par with the US currency in a bid to win back guests at his three Las Vegas properties.】

item.title: 小型股有望创下自1996年以来对标普500指数的最长连胜纪录
item.description: 今年以来，小盘股的每日表现都优于大盘股。【原文：Small-capitalization stocks are outperforming their bigger peers every day this year.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会寻求新途径推进陷入停滞的阿达尼欺诈案
item.description: 在未能向高塔姆·阿达尼送达法律传票逾一年后，美国证券交易委员会希望法官为该机构推进针对这位印度亿万富翁的欺诈案扫清障碍。【原文：After failing to serve Gautam Adani with a legal summons for more than a year, the US Securities and Exchange Commission wants a judge to clear a way for the agency to advance with its fraud case against the Indian billionaire.】

item.title: 奈飞首席内容官萨兰多斯将出席参议院听证会就华纳并购案作证
item.description: 网飞公司联合首席执行官泰德·萨兰多斯计划于2月在美国参议院委员会听证会上作证，该听证会旨在审查该公司拟以827亿美元收购华纳兄弟探索公司流媒体业务及影视制作部门的交易。【原文：Netflix Inc. co-Chief Executive Officer Ted Sarandos is planning to testify in February at a US Senate committee hearing looking into his company’s proposed $82.7 billion purchase of the streaming and studio operations of Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.】

item.title: 百慕大监管机构取消伊根-琼斯评级机构的认可资质
item.description: 根据监管机构最新发布的指引，伊根-琼斯评级公司已被移出百慕大货币管理局认可的信用评级机构名单。【原文：Egan-Jones Ratings Co. has been removed from the Bermuda Monetary Authority’s list of recognized credit ratings providers, according to recent guidance from the watchdog.】

item.title: 法国巴黎银行计划在与安盛投资管理整合过程中裁减约1,200个岗位
item.description: 法国巴黎银行正寻求裁减约1,200个职位，以完成对资产管理公司安盛投资管理公司的整合。【原文：BNP Paribas SA is seeking to eliminate about 1,200 positions as it completes the integration of the asset management unit Axa Investment Managers.】

item.title: 本杰瑞独立董事在巨无霸之争中败退
item.description: 本杰瑞冰淇淋公司董事会中的独立董事席位已被实质性清空，这标志着这家以社会使命著称的冰淇淋品牌与其母公司Magnum冰淇淋公司之间的纠纷再度升级。【原文：Ben & Jerry’s was effectively stripped of independent directors from its board, in the latest escalation of a dispute between the ice-cream brand known for its social mission and parent Magnum Ice Cream Co.】

item.title: 寒流恐致美国天然气产量创2021年以来最大降幅，能源咨询机构Energy Aspects称
item.description: 据能源咨询公司Energy Aspects最新预测，一场即将席卷美国东部三分之二地区的冬季风暴，可能因管道内积水冻结而严重扰乱天然气生产。【原文：A winter storm that’s poised to sweep the eastern two-thirds of the US threatens significant disruptions to natural gas production as water freezes inside pipelines, according to a new forecast from Energy Aspects.】

item.title: 加密货币公司BitGo首次公开募股筹集2.128亿美元后，股价首日大涨25%
item.description: 加密货币公司BitGo Holdings Inc.及其部分支持者在美国首次公开募股中筹集了2.128亿美元后，该公司股票开盘价较IPO价格上涨25%。【原文：BitGo Holdings Inc. shares opened 25% above their IPO price, after the crypto firm and some of its backers raised $212.8 million in a US initial public offering.】

item.title: 美国地区性银行竞相涌入高评级债券市场融资
item.description: 美国地区性银行正争相进入投资级债券市场融资，这表明市场正趋于平静——此前因特朗普总统就格陵兰岛问题引发的争议以及日本债券抛售潮，本周早些时候曾令投资者感到不安。【原文：US regional banks are racing to the investment-grade debt market for funding, signaling calmer waters after tensions over President Donald Trump’s dispute over Greenland and a selloff in Japanese bonds unsettled investors earlier this week.】

item.title: 米莱认为阿根廷尚未准备好实行自由浮动比索汇率
item.description: 自2023年就任以来，哈维尔·米莱不得不将许多激进主张调整为治理阿根廷的现实方案。他曾称之为"杀手"的中国官员，如今成了"重要的贸易伙伴"。他誓言要烧毁的中央银行依然矗立。关于美元化的讨论已悄然终止。【原文：Since taking office in 2023, Javier Milei has had to adapt many of his radical ideas to the realities of governing Argentina. Chinese officials he once called “assassins” turned into “great trade partners.” The central bank he pledged to burn down is still standing. Talk of dollarization has ceased.】

item.title: 加拿大喷气机公司通过扮演空战中的"反派角色"获利
item.description: 随着特朗普政府颠覆持续数十年的安全联盟，欧洲各国正迅速增加国防预算。对一家加拿大公司而言，这意味着巨大商机——以及可能的上市之路。【原文：European nations are rapidly increasing their defense budgets as the Trump administration upends a security alliance that has lasted for decades. For a Canadian firm, that means big business — and a possible pathway to going public.】

item.title: 千禧年公司创立新型信用交易业务
item.description: 千禧管理公司正从其固定收益业务中剥离出一个专门的信贷交易部门，这是这家多策略对冲基金巨头最新的一项变革举措。【原文：Millennium Management is carving out a dedicated credit trading unit from its fixed income business in the latest change at the multistrategy hedge fund giant.】

item.title: 华尔街不愿谈论特朗普
item.description: 达沃斯正展示银行家们应对美国总统的第一生存法则：不谈论他。【原文：Davos is showcasing bankers’ first rule of surviving the US president: you don’t talk about him.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率从三年低点小幅回升，达到6.09%
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率从三年低点攀升，因对格陵兰岛可能引发贸易战的担忧推高了政府债券收益率——这些债券是住房贷款的基准利率。【原文：US mortgage rates climbed from a three-year low as fears about a potential trade war over Greenland drove up yields for the government bonds that guide home loans.】

item.title: 智利卡普斯顿矿因罢工停产
item.description: 智利北部卡普斯通铜业公司的一座矿山因持续近三周的劳工罢工而停产，导致全球市场供应进一步趋紧。【原文：Production at a Capstone Copper Corp. mine in northern Chile has halted amid a nearly three-week labor strike, further tightening the global market.】

item.title: 美国国债下跌，就业与支出数据支持美联储暂停加息
item.description: 美国经济数据显示就业市场和消费者支出具有韧性，这强化了交易员对美联储将推迟降息至2026年后期的预期。【原文：Traders’ expectations that the Federal Reserve will delay interest-rate cuts until later in 2026 were reinforced by US economic data showing resilience in the job market and consumer spending.】
